page.title: 16HEALTH
page.content: {HEALTH - FOOD FAVOURITES} A SURVEY WAS CARRIED OUT AMONG 90 CHILDREN AGED BETWEEN 6 AN 9 TO FIND OUT WHETHER THEIR FAVOURITE FOOD WAS GOOD FOR THEM.GENERALLY SPEAKING NATURAL FOODS ARE TODAY CONSIDERED HEALTHY AND FOODS WHICH ARE SYNTHETIC OR HIGH IN FAT OR SUGAR ARE NOT SO HEALTHY. {HEALTHY FAVOURITE FOODS {BEEF-3,MACARONI CHEESE-2,CHEESE ON {TOAST,FISH FINGERS-3,CHEESE {BURGER,SHEPHERDS PIE-2,ROAST POTATOES {-2,CHILI CON CARNI,LAMB-2,ORANGE JUICE {-4,APPLE JUICE,MINCEMEAT-3,SPAGHETTI-3 {CHICKEN-3,BREAD,STRAWBERRIES-3,CORN ON {THE COB,HAMBURGER-5,PIZZA,TOMATOES-2, {SALAD,CHEESE ROLLS,TURKEY,RAW CABBAGE, {APPLE,POMEGRANATE,GRATED CARROT-1. QUITE A LOT OF CHILDREN ARE MOST FOND OF FOOD WHICH IS GOOD FOR THEM.
